name: api_physics_Collider
description: A base class of all colliders.

properties.name: attachedArticulationBody
properties.description: The articulation body the collider is attached to.

properties.name: attachedRigidbody
properties.description: The rigidbody the collider is attached to.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The world space bounding volume of the collider (Read Only).

properties.name: contactOffset
properties.description: Contact offset value of this collider.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Enabled Colliders will collide with other Colliders, disabled Colliders won't.

properties.name: excludeLayers
properties.description: The additional layers that this Collider should exclude when deciding if the Collider can contact another Collider.

properties.name: GeometryHolder
properties.description: The structure holding the geometric shape of the collider and its type. (Read Only)

properties.name: hasModifiableContacts
properties.description: Specify whether this Collider's contacts are modifiable or not.

properties.name: includeLayers
properties.description: The additional layers that this Collider should include when deciding if the Collider can contact another Collider.

properties.name: isTrigger
properties.description: Specify if this collider is configured as a trigger.

properties.name: layerOverridePriority
properties.description: A decision priority assigned to this Collider used when there is a conflicting decision on whether a Collider can contact another Collider.

properties.name: material
properties.description: The material used by the collider.

properties.name: providesContacts
properties.description: Whether or not this Collider generates contacts for Physics.ContactEvent.

properties.name: sharedMaterial
properties.description: The shared physics material of this collider.
